mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: Aslam have a few pairs of cattle. ,Aslam has few pairs of cattles. ,Aslam has a few pairs of cattle. ,Aslam has a few pair of cattle.

options.a: Aslam have a few pairs of cattle.
options.b: Aslam has few pairs of cattles.
options.c: Aslam has a few pairs of cattle.
options.d: Aslam has a few pair of cattle.
